name: HealthCounts
overview:
HealthCounts is Saving your health and dollar.

Drug and health products are expensive! Even when there are discounts or better prices, they are almost impossible to find and complicated to access. Our goal is to get you the best price for the drugs and health products you need and want as simply and efficiently as possible. Every day we search the byzantine world of drug and health product coupons and pharmacy pricing to make it as easy as possible for our users to get the drugs and products they need.

As our site develops, we plan to offer you a wide range of services and information exchange opportunities to enrich your user experience and make us an important destination for you, your family, and your friends.

At its core, HealthCounts is a portal to medications and other health care coupons making health care more affordable. Our coupons assist you with the purchase of prescription drugs, vitamins, wellness and other health related products and services. In addition, our relationship with our strategic partner Agelity, a pharmacy benefit service company, provides you with a free drug discount card that can be used at a wide range of pharmacies near your home or workplace and enables you to compare the price you will be charged at these pharmacies in real-time so that you can make the most informed purchase decision.
